text: Émile Clerc (born 5 June 1934) is a French rower. He competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne with the men's eight where they were eliminated in round one. ==References== == External links == * * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:People from Thonon-les-Bains Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for France Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Haute-Savoie Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Émile Clerc
